Module org.microbean.interceptor
Package org.microbean.interceptor

Interface InterceptorFunction

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Prioritized>, Prioritized
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface InterceptorFunction extends Prioritized
An interface whose implementations perform interceptions.
Author:
Laird Nelson

    intercept(Object interceptor, InvocationContext invocationContext)
    Intercepts the interception event represented by the supplied invocationContext and returns the result.

  • Method Details

    • intercept

      Object intercept(Object interceptor, InvocationContext invocationContext) throws Exception
      Intercepts the interception event represented by the supplied invocationContext and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      interceptor - the interceptor performing the interception; must not be null
      invocationContext - the InvocationContext representing the interception event; must not be null
      Returns:
      the result of the interception; may be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any argument is null
      Exception - if an error occurs
